issue.title: kinotehnik.net
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://kinotehnik.net/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fkinotehnik.net%2F) ### Comment > This rule neutralizes the adblocker detection: ``kinotehnik.net##+js(abort-on-property-read, higrzv)`` ``` Username: @SpoiledSneeze ``` ### Screenshots

issue.title: www.hdnumerique.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.hdnumerique.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hdnumerique.com%2F) ### Comment > There was a load of site-specific affiliate banners throughout the website. I've narrowed down the affiliates sites linked and the different elements used to make these rules. Should the editor start using different affiliate domains, the ads will reappear, and the rules will need to be adjusted accordingly. > ``` > hdnumerique.com##aside:has(div[onclick*="amazon.fr"], div[onclick*="amzn.to"], div[onclick*="awin1.com"], div[onclick*="tidd.ly"]) > hdnumerique.com##div.column:has(> div.card[onclick*="amazon.fr"], > div.card[onclick*="amzn.to"], > div.card[onclick*="awin1.com"], > div.card[onclick*="tidd.ly"]) > hdnumerique.com##div[data-content="BON PLAN"], #heroPub1 > ``` ``` Username: @SpoiledSneeze ``` ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adtidy.org/sitereports/5eb5t8uozcgs4swgwkws8wwkgko4404r5219j8pqa8.png?nc=1)

Block trackers,
